summary: Applies a collection of Kornia AugmentationSequential pipelines to the same input (e.g., image and mask) and returns a list of the resulting augmented tensors, while enforcing that all pipelines share identical data_keys and preserve the input order unless relaxed.
business_intent: Enable generation of multiple consistent augmented versions of a single data sample for training, validation, or ensemble scenarios, simplifying data augmentation management and reducing errors caused by mismatched keys or swapped inputs.
